mapper.select: SELECT cm.id, cu.name AS uname, cm.type, cm.title, cm.content, cm.regdate, cm.location, cm.imgname, cm.views FROM commu cm INNER JOIN cust cu ON cm.uid=cu.id WHERE cm.id=#{id};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM commu WHERE type=#{type};

SELECT cm.id, cu.name AS uname, cm.type, cm.title, cm.content, cm.regdate, cm.location, cm.imgname, cm.views FROM commu cm INNER JOIN cust cu ON cm.uid=cu.id WHERE cm.location=#{location};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commu VALUES(NULL, #{uid}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, CURDATE(), #{location}, #{imgname}, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE commu SET type=#{type}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, location=#{location}, imgname=#{imgname} WHERE id=#{id}
